metadata.title: CVE-2020-18671 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
Cross Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Roundcube Mail <=1.4.4 via smtp config in /installer/test.php.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-18671` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

roundcube - 1.4.11+dfsg.1-4
roundcube-core - 1.4.11+dfsg.1-4
roundcube-mysql - 1.4.11+dfsg.1-4
roundcube-pgsql - 1.4.11+dfsg.1-4
roundcube-plugins - 1.4.11+dfsg.1-4
roundcube-sqlite3 - 1.4.11+dfsg.1-4
No subscription required

notes.note: ccdm94> same fix as the one applied for CVE-2020-18670.

criterions.comment: roundcube package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.4.11+dfsg.1-4').
